charinfo.name: Haku
charinfo.description: The sole survivor of the Yuki clan, and the subordinate of Zabuza; Haku, despite being young, holds enough potential strength to surpass almost any ninja. Using his ice based bloodline, and his intelligence, Haku can attack and defend nearly simultaneously.

abilities.name: Flying Water Needles Of Death
abilities.description: Haku flings a number of water based needles dealing 30 damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Acupuncture
abilities.description: Haku targets one ally's or enemy's vital points. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned for 1 turn. If used on an ally, all stun effects on them will be removed and they will ignore all stun effects for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals
abilities.description: Haku creates numerous mirrors, and for 3 turns, Haku will become invulnerable. The following 3 turns 'Flying Water Needles of Death' will target all enemies and 'Acupuncture' will target all allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Needle Parry
abilities.description: This skill makes Haku invulnerable for 1 turn.
